titlestmt.titleproper: W. S. Bruce Letter To Chairman Of The Board Of Stewards Grace Church, Portland, Oregon 1899 March 13.
Bruce (W. S.) Letter To Chairman Of The Board Of Stewards Grace Church, Portland, Oregon

did.unittitle: W. S. Bruce letter to Chairman of the Board of Stewards Grace Church, Portland, Oregon
did.abstract: Letter from W. S. Bruce, Boise, Idaho, to Chairman of the Board of Stewards Grace Church, Portland, Oregon, 2 pp, 13 March 1899, urging the consideration of John W. Huston as pastor of Grace Methodist Episcopal Church.

scopecontent.p: Letter from W. S. Bruce, Boise, Idaho, to Chairman of the Board of Stewards Grace Church, Portland, Oregon, 2 pp, 13 March 1899, urging the consideration of John W. Huston as pastor of Grace Methodist Episcopal Church.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open to the public.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use of reproductions may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright holders.

prefercite.p: W. S. Bruce letter to Chairman of the Board of Stewards Grace Church, Portland, Oregon, Mss 1500, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.
